    • 构造器详细资料

      • Property

        public Property(java.lang.String url,
        int deepth,
        int topN,
        OS os,
        java.lang.String path,
        boolean needsIndex)
        crawl only one url
        参数:
        url - the url which want to be crawled
        deepth - deepth
        topN - max links of one page
        os - current operate system
        path - crawl files apth
        needsIndex - true - it will index the docs after crawl
        false - it will NOT index the docs after crawl

      • Property

        public Property(java.lang.String[] urls,
        int deepth,
        int topN,
        OS os,
        java.lang.String path,
        boolean needsIndex)
        crawl many urls
        参数:
        urls - the array of urls which to be crawled
        deepth - deepth
        topN - max links of one page
        os - current operate system
        path - crawl files apth
        needsIndex - true - it will index the docs after crawl
        false - it will NOT index the docs after crawl
